entry.title: microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml - Releases - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
WinUI 3 in WinAppSDK 1.6-preview1

The source code for the version of WinUI 3 in the WinAppSDK 1.6-preview1 is available. 1.6-preview1 is a preview release for the WinAppSDK that includes bug fixes for 1.5 and provides early access to new APIs and features for WinUI 3, System Backdrops, Content, Windowing, Input, and Controls.

Check out our release notes for the list of fixed issues and new APIs in this release.

Download the NuGet package for 1.6-preview1 here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.6.240807006-preview1.

WinUI 3 in WinAppSDK 1.5.6

The source code for the version of WinUI 3 in the WinAppSDK 1.5.6 is available. 1.5.6 is a stable servicing release for the WinAppSDK that fixes critical bugs for 1.5.

Check out our release notes for the list of issues fixed in this release.

Download the NuGet package for 1.5.6 here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.5.240802000.

WinUI 3 in WinAppSDK 1.4.7

The source code for the version of WinUI 3 in the WinAppSDK 1.4.7 is available. 1.4.7 is a stable servicing release for the WinAppSDK that fixes critical bugs for 1.4.

Check out our release notes for the list of issues fixed in this release.

Download the NuGet package for 1.4.7 here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.4.240802001.

entry.title: microsoft/WindowsAppSDK - Releases - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Windows App SDK 1.4.7 (1.4.240802001)

Windows App SDK 1.4.7 is a stable servicing release that fixes critical bugs for 1.4.

  • If you're building an app with the Windows App SDK for the first time, follow the installation instructions here.

  • If you are already using the Windows App SDK 1.4 and would like to update to the latest release, you can do so by following the update instructions here.

Check out our release notes for the list of issues fixed in this release.

Updating to this version

The 1.4.7 package is available at https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.4.240802001

Windows App SDK 1.5.6 (1.5.240802000)

Windows App SDK 1.5.6 (1.5.240802000)

Windows App SDK 1.5.6 is a stable servicing release that fixes critical bugs for 1.5.

  • If you're building an app with the Windows App SDK for the first time, follow the installation instructions here.

  • If you are already using the Windows App SDK 1.5 and would like to update to the latest release, you can do so by following the update instructions here.

Check out our release notes for the list of issues fixed in this release.

Updating to this version

The 1.5.6 package is available at https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.5.240802000

v1.6.0-preview1

1.6 Preview 1 (1.6.240807006-preview1) 🔃

The first preview of WinAppSDK 1.6 is now available! Check out the release notes for more information on the new & updated features and known issues.

Updating to this version

The 1.6-preview1 package is available at https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.6.240807006-preview1

Providing feedback

As we introduce new & upcoming features in our preview releases, we appreciate all of your feedback as we work towards a stable release:

  • For WinUI 3 feedback, please open an issue on the WinUI repo.
  • For feedback regarding all other Windows App SDK components, please open an issue here, on the Windows App SDK repo.
